title: Should I get an Aavegotchi-themed tattoo?
body: I have many tattoos and could for fun get a small one related to the game. This could create some mild buzz around Aavegotchi. It may not be possible to get it until after Covid, bit then we should be good to go.
author: 0x6e0FC44CcE1B49323185138217649B5E8996A159
